survey.surveyor: Name of surveyors. e.g. Clinton Marine Survey
survey.vessel: Name of vessel. e.g. Northern Storm
survey.sonarModel: Name of sonar model. e.g. Kongsberg EM2040
survey.sonarSerialNumber: Serial number of sonar system. e.g. 2106
survey.comments: Free text field. e.g. Surveyed over Aug 21-23, 2022

data.acquisitionMode: Sonar acquisition mode. e.g. Medium CW
data.filesList: List of raw data files used in mosaic. e.g. All files available
data.comments: Free text field. e.g. Very wide range of absorption coefficients in data

processing.softwareName: Name of processing software. e.g. QPS FMGT

mosaic.author: Mosaic author. e.g. Alexandre Schimel
mosaic.projection: Mosaic datum and projection. e.g. WGS84-UTM31N
mosaic.comments: Free text field. e.g. To update when provided with final bathymetry grid
